risk_captures.overall_comment: Comprehensive risk assessment with appropriate mitigation strategies for mobile banking security
Several high-impact risks need additional mitigation controls, especially around payment security and data protection

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kehilangan data customer akibat kerusakan server atau cyberattack
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Kehilangan kepercayaan customer, reputasi perusahaan rusak, potensi tuntutan hukum
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Kerugian finansial hingga 2 miliar rupiah, biaya recovery 500 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Backup data harian, redundant server, firewall, antivirus enterprise

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Keterlambatan implementasi sistem ERP karena kompleksitas integrasi
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Resource constraints, Technical complexity, Scope creep
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Delay go-live, impact business operations, customer dissatisfaction
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Penalty 300 juta rupiah, additional resource cost 200 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Project monitoring weekly, milestone tracking, change control process

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Data migration gagal atau data corrupt selama proses migrasi ke ERP baru
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Data inconsistency, Migration tool limitation, Human error
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Business disruption, wrong decision making, operational inefficiency
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Data recovery cost 400 juta rupiah, business downtime loss 600 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Data validation tools, migration testing, rollback procedure

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Resistensi user terhadap sistem baru menyebabkan low adoption rate
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Change resistance, Insufficient training, Complex user interface
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Low productivity, system underutilization, training cost increase
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Additional training cost 150 juta rupiah, productivity loss 300 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: User training program, change management, user support helpdesk

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kegagalan integrasi ERP dengan sistem existing (CRM, accounting, inventory)
risk_items.sumber_risiko: API incompatibility, Data format mismatch, Legacy system limitation
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Manual workaround needed, data silos, operational inefficiency
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Additional integration cost 800 juta rupiah, manual process cost 200 juta/bulan
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Integration testing, API documentation, pilot implementation

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Performance sistem lambat saat peak load atau concurrent users tinggi
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Insufficient server capacity, Database optimization issue, Network bandwidth
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: User frustration, productivity decrease, system timeout
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Infrastructure upgrade cost 600 juta rupiah, productivity loss 100 juta/bulan
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Load testing, server monitoring, database tuning, scalable architecture

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Vendor ERP tidak memberikan support yang memadai atau discontinue product
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Vendor business issue, Product lifecycle, Support contract limitation
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Limited support, security vulnerabilities, forced migration to new system
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Migration cost 3 miliar rupiah, extended support cost 500 juta/tahun
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Vendor evaluation, SLA agreement, escrow agreement, alternative vendor assessment

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Sistem ERP tidak memenuhi requirement audit atau regulasi yang berlaku
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Regulation change, Audit requirement, Data privacy law
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Audit finding, regulatory penalty, legal compliance issue
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Compliance cost 200 juta rupiah, potential fine 500 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Compliance review, audit trail, regulatory consultation, documentation

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Fraud transaksi melalui compromised authentication atau session hijacking
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Weak authentication, Session vulnerability, Device compromise
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Customer loss, regulatory penalty, reputation damage, legal liability
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Fraud loss 5 miliar rupiah, investigation cost 300 juta rupiah, fine 1 miliar rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Multi-factor authentication, biometric, session timeout, device binding, fraud detection
risk_items.verifier_comment: Strong security controls implemented, risk properly mitigated

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kebocoran data personal customer melalui mobile app vulnerability
risk_items.sumber_risiko: App vulnerability, Data transmission, Storage security, API security
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Privacy violation, customer trust loss, regulatory investigation
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: GDPR fine 2 miliar rupiah, remediation cost 500 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Data encryption, secure API, penetration testing, privacy by design
risk_items.verifier_comment: Good privacy controls, encryption properly implemented

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: App tidak kompatibel dengan berbagai device atau OS version yang menyebabkan user experience buruk
risk_items.sumber_risiko: OS fragmentation, Device diversity, Version compatibility, Performance variation
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Poor user experience, low adoption rate, negative reviews, support burden
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Additional development cost 400 juta rupiah, support cost 100 juta/bulan
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Multi-device testing, progressive enhancement, compatibility matrix, user feedback
risk_items.verifier_comment: Comprehensive testing strategy addresses compatibility issues

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Aplikasi ditolak oleh App Store atau Play Store karena tidak memenuhi policy
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Store policy violation, Content guidelines, Security requirements, Review process
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Launch delay, market entry postponement, competitive disadvantage
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Launch delay cost 200 juta rupiah, marketing adjustment 150 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Policy compliance review, pre-submission testing, store guideline adherence
risk_items.verifier_comment: App store requirements well understood and addressed

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: App performance buruk saat peak usage atau network connectivity rendah
risk_items.sumber_risiko: High concurrent users, Network latency, Server capacity, Database performance
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: User frustration, transaction abandonment, customer complaints, service reputation
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Infrastructure scaling cost 600 juta rupiah, revenue loss 300 juta/bulan
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Load testing, performance monitoring, auto-scaling, offline capability, caching
risk_items.verifier_comment: Performance optimization and scaling strategy well planned

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kegagalan integrasi dengan third party services (payment gateway, SMS, push notification)
risk_items.sumber_risiko: API changes, Service downtime, Rate limiting, Authentication failure
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Service disruption, feature unavailability, user experience degradation
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Alternative service cost 200 juta rupiah, integration rework 300 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Redundant providers, API monitoring, fallback mechanisms, SLA agreements
risk_items.verifier_comment: Good redundancy and fallback strategy for third party dependencies

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Fraud payment atau chargeback yang tinggi karena security vulnerability
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Payment vulnerability, Credit card fraud, Identity theft
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Financial loss, merchant account suspension, customer distrust
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Chargeback loss 1 miliar rupiah, fraud protection cost 300 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: SSL encryption, PCI compliance, fraud detection
risk_items.verifier_comment: Need stronger fraud detection and real-time monitoring

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Stock out atau overselling karena real-time inventory tracking yang tidak akurat
risk_items.sumber_risiko: System lag, Integration delay, Manual error, Concurrent transactions
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Customer dissatisfaction, order cancellation, reputation damage
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Lost sales 500 juta rupiah, compensation cost 200 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Real-time sync, inventory buffer, transaction locking

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Website crash atau performance buruk saat flash sale atau peak traffic
risk_items.sumber_risiko: High traffic volume, Server capacity, Database bottleneck, CDN capacity
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Sales loss, customer frustration, brand reputation damage
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Revenue loss 2 miliar rupiah, infrastructure upgrade 800 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Load balancer, auto-scaling, CDN, performance monitoring
risk_items.verifier_comment: Scalability plan needs stress testing validation

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kebocoran data customer termasuk payment information dan personal data
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Security breach, Insider threat, Database vulnerability, API exposure
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Legal liability, regulatory penalty, customer trust loss, business closure
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: GDPR fine 5 miliar rupiah, legal cost 1 miliar rupiah, business loss 10 miliar rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Data encryption, access control, security audit, penetration testing
risk_items.verifier_comment: Need enhanced data loss prevention and monitoring

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Critical third party service downtime (payment gateway, shipping, email service)
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Vendor outage, Service maintenance, Contract termination, Technical issues
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Service disruption, order processing halt, customer communication failure
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Revenue loss 300 juta/hari, alternative service cost 150 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Multiple vendor options, SLA monitoring, backup services
